```{r}
# Load required libraries
library(visNetwork)
library(sysfonts)
library(showtext)
library(gdtools)

# Step 1: Register Google Font and enable showtext
font_add_google("News Cycle", "News Cycle")
showtext_auto()
register_gfont("News Cycle")

# Step 2: Sample data with font settings using HTML/CSS
nodes <- data.frame(
  id = 1:3,
  label = c("Alice", "Bob", "Charlie"),
  font = list(
    face = "News Cycle", 
    size = 26, 
    color = "#003049"
  )
)

edges <- data.frame(
  from = c(1, 2),
  to = c(2, 3),
  label = c("Knows", "Helps"),
  font = list(
    face = "News Cycle", 
    size = 18, 
    align = "middle"
  )
)

# Step 3: Create interactive network with News Cycle font
visNetwork(nodes, edges) %>%
  visOptions(highlightNearest = TRUE, nodesIdSelection = TRUE) %>%
  visLayout(randomSeed = 123)

```
